title: RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module > RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module > RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module: Documentation and Resources
content:

title: RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module > RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module > Product Description > RAK12017 IR Detection Module Overview
content: The RAK12017 is an IR detection module. This module uses ITR20001 optical switch from Everlight to detect whether the IR Signal reflects. Sample applications of this module are: to identify if an object is approaching and check changes between black and white lines.
parent_content: The RAK12017 is an IR detection module. This module uses ITR20001 optical switch from Everlight to detect whether the IR Signal reflects. Sample applications of this module are: to identify if an object is approaching and check changes between black and white lines.

title: RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module > RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module > Prerequisites > RAK12017 Module Requirements and Setup
content:
To use a **RAK12017**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** provides power supply to the **RAK12017** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
parent_content:
To use a **RAK12017**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** provides power supply to the **RAK12017** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
